Framed Prints

Bring a touch of classic Hollywood glamour to your home with this beautiful framed print featuring Richard Attenborough and his wife Sheila Simon. Captured in the 1960s, this timeless image from Mirrorpix is now available as a framed print from Media Storehouse's Memory Lane Prints collection. The high-quality print is expertly framed in a classic design, making it an elegant addition to any room. Relive the magic of the past with this stunning piece of cinematic history.

Photo Prints

Bring a touch of classic Hollywood glamour to your home with this stunning photograph of Richard Attenborough and his wife Sheila Simon, taken circa 1960. This beautiful image, from the Media Storehouse collection at Memory Lane Prints, captures a moment in time as the beloved actor and filmmaker shares a warm smile with his wife. Relive the magic of the past with this high-quality photographic print, perfect for adding character and charm to any room in your home.

Poster Prints

Bring a touch of classic Hollywood glamour to your home or office with this beautiful poster print featuring the iconic couple, Richard Attenborough and Sheila Simon. Captured in the 1960s, this timeless image from Mirrorpix's Memory Lane Prints collection is a must-have for any film or history enthusiast. The high-quality print showcases the natural charm and elegance of the beloved actor and his wife, making it a stunning addition to any decor. Relive the magic of the past with this collectible poster print.

Jigsaw Puzzles

Bring a piece of history into your home with our exquisite jigsaw puzzle from the Media Storehouse collection. Featuring a captivating image of the beloved couple, Richard Attenborough and Sheila Simon, taken circa 1960. This puzzle, sourced from Mirrorpix and Memory Lane Prints, offers a nostalgic trip back in time. With intricate details and vibrant colors, this jigsaw puzzle is not only a fun and engaging activity but also a beautiful piece of art to display once completed. Create memories as you piece together this charming puzzle, a perfect addition to any room in your house.
